featured.text: For example, when the riders scan the band at the Off-Road Adventure, a photo will be taken and sent to their email.

definition.zh_def: 電子郵件，一種通過互聯網發送和接收的消息形式。
definition.en_def: A method of exchanging digital messages over the internet.
definition.example: I sent an email to my professor asking for clarification on the assignment.
